{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NetComm |model=3G22WV |revision= |fcc_date=10/02/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, 3G mobile router, analog phone gateway, |fcc_id=XIA-3G22WV,N7NMC8705 |ic_id=2417C-MC8705 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3352 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (USB), USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3352 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC8705 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=MDMxxxx |wi2_802dot11_protocols=HSPA+ |wi2_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G (HSPA+) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.20.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|HSPA+ WiFi Router with Voice}} :[http://www.netcommwireless.com/product/3g/3g22wv Product page]
Ports: 3x 10/100 (LAN), 1x 10/100/1000 (WAN/LAN), 2x USB 2.0
The default credentials in this entry are based on the FCC label.
